A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I watched it twice\, because the first time I was in shock. Second time I wanted a refund. Utterly awful Star Wars film\, I won't be adding this to my collection. Disney are now aiming this at a general audience for a quick profit\, which is sad because I thought they actually cared about the 'product' so much for that. What's with Rian Johnson introducing drugs into Star Wars - Blue Milk? Luke tripping out? WTF.
